Tyrael.name: El'Druin's Might
Tyrael.description: Deals 110 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

Tyrael.name: Righteousness
Tyrael.description: Shields you for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 135 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Smite
Tyrael.description: Rake target area for 144 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Judgment
Tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

Tyrael.name: Sanctification
Tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Archangel's Wrath
Tyrael.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

1.name: Even In Death
1.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

1.name: Protection in Death
1.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

1.name: Purge Evil
1.description: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Horadric Reforging
4.description: If El'druin's Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

4.name: Swift Retribution
4.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

4.name: Vigorous Strike
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Angel's Grace
7.description: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.description: When your shield expires, it explodes for 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Zealotry
7.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 50 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Angelic Absorption
13.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded grant 240 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds.

13.name: Angelic Might
13.description: Gain 80% increased damage on your next Basic Attack for each Hero hit by Smite.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Blade of Justice
16.description: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, increase your Attack Speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

16.name: Holy Ground
16.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

16.name: Salvation
16.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 45%.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Nullification Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds.
